name: Stock Photo
description: Use Overstock's product and lifestyle photos for your blog. Each one will link to its corresponding product page on Overstock.com.
notes: You will get the product id from the products URL on Overstock.com. For instance, the product URL "http://www.overstock.com/Home-Garden/DHP-Emily-Grey-Linen-Chaise-Lounger/9747008/product.html" has a product ID of 9747008.

optional_attributes.name: image_number
optional_attributes.description: Choose an image number, images are numbered from left to right on the product page, 1,2,3, ect.

optional_attributes.name: width
optional_attributes.description: Width of the shortcode element. This attribute accepts "px" or "%"

optional_attributes.name: height
optional_attributes.description: Height of the shortcode element. This attribute accepts "px"
optional_attributes.notes: The height of the image will automatically adjust according to the width. The best practice would be to only set the height if it absolutely necessary .

optional_attributes.name: link_target
optional_attributes.description: Choose how to open the link.

optional_attributes.name: custom_css
optional_attributes.description: Add custom CSS to the image element.
